sentences: Peamine asi on see, et me saame teha oma tööd.
Tema peamine eesmärk oli õppida kõiki asju.
See on peamine põhjus, miks ta tuli.
context: The Estonian word 'peamine' is an adjective that means 'main', 'primary', 'principal', or 'the most important'. It is used to indicate something that is of primary importance, the main element, or chief among other things. In Estonian grammar, it can appear in different forms depending on the case and number of the noun it modifies.
